entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
